KNOWLEDGE HUB

The Knowledge Hub, an esteemed initiative spearheaded by the Academic Quality Office (AQO) in collaboration with the Centre for Academic Development (CAD) at British University Vietnam (BUV). Committed to raising the standards of teaching and learning, the Knowledge Hub stands as a pillar of excellence, cultivating an environment where faculty members can excel and attain their highest potential. By offering a sophisticated blend of workshops, training sessions, and professional development opportunities, we aim to support and empower our faculty, ensuring they remain at the vanguard of educational innovation and effectiveness. Knowledge Hub is a collaborative endeavor toward academic distinction, where the continuous exchange of best practices and an unwavering commitment to lifelong learning constitute the foundation of our mission.

Objectives of Knowledge Hub

+ Enhance Teaching and Learning Quality

+  Organize workshops and training sessions on pedagogic themes in association with CAD.

+  Facilitate professional development opportunities for faculty to improve teaching effectiveness.

+ Improve Faculty Experience and Effectiveness

+  Provide comprehensive support to both existing and new faculty through tailored training programs.

+  Establish a workgroup in association with CAD to address faculty needs and promote best practices.

+ Encourage Faculty Participation in Professional Programs

+  Promote involvement in programs like the Higher Education Academy (HEA) fellowship.

+  Offer targeted support to help faculty achieve excellence in teaching practices.

+ Foster a Collaborative Learning Environment

+  Foster a Collaborative Learning Environment

+  Encourage faculty collaboration and sharing of best practices within the university community.

+ Continuous Improvement

+  Implement a feedback loop to continuously assess and enhance the effectiveness of training programs and workshops.

+  Stay updated with the latest developments in pedagogic methods and integrate them into the Knowledge Hub initiatives.
